content: i made the prototype of this hat for st mungo s woolly hat day 1 and having wrestled with the crown decreases for a considerable period of time thought that the pattern might be worth sharing at some point i intend trying out a larger size for those of us myself included who do not fit in the one size fits all sizing favoured by high street shops you should be able to make two hats from one ball of king cole mirage 1 http //www mungos org/woollyhatday_2012
